events.message: The customer reported a car collision that happened yesterday afternoon involving their vehicle and another on the highway.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the collision and vehicle damages.
An agent has been assigned to handle the claim and will reach out to the customer shortly to guide them through the process.
Acknowledgment of the claim has been sent to the customer confirming receipt and informing them of next steps.
The agent requested photographs of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report to proceed with the investigation.
Customer has submitted all the requested documents including detailed photos of the collision damage and official police report.
Investigation team has initiated the case review based on provided materials to assess the extent of the damages and liability.
The investigation has concluded confirming the claim validity and the estimated repair costs for the damaged vehicle.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the customer covering the repair and other associated costs of the auto accident.
Customer provided positive feedback regarding the timely response and clarity of the settlement proposal received.
The claim has been officially approved following acceptance of the proposed settlement by the customer.
Payment has been issued to the customer to cover the repair expenses for the vehicle as per the approved claim.
The claim is now closed following successful payment and customer confirmation that repairs are underway.
The claim documents and records have been archived in compliance with company policy for future reference.
